subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Porzingis, a 7-foot-1 forward from Latvia who has spent the past three seasons with Cajasol Sevilla of the Spanish league, is regarded as a player with huge potential but may need time to develop.
